EmailTemplate.name: 2020.02.05 - BS - Free Shipping Email.Free Shipping Email
EmailTemplate.subject: You Now Get It FREE!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your purchases now qualify for FREE shipping* – that’s a better shopping experience for you. And, if you use code 0220SAVE before February 14, 2020 you’ll enjoy an extra 15% OFF** your purchase of $100 or more. You’re welcome!
Free Shipping In Stock Clearance Deal Centre Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx]]> Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx]]> Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx]]> View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1 866 391‑8111
**Must sign in to your Grand & Toy account to redeem promo code. Offer valid at www.grandandtoy.com only. Must spend $100 before tax on qualifying items to be eligible for 15% off discount. Enter promo code 0220SAVE at checkout. Not valid on paper or special orders. Void if copied, sold, purchased, transferred, taxed or where prohibited. Cannot be combined with any other coupon, associate discount, or any other offers. Offer not valid on prior purchases or for credit card payments. No cash or credit back. Open to Canadian residents only. Cash value .001¢. Offer expires February 14, 2020.
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special-order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.. © 2020 Grand & Toy Limited ${customBodyHtml1}
